title: SOLD: 1909-16 PC758 Max Stein Postcard Joe Wood - SOLD
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1909-16 PC758 Max Stein Postcard Joe Wood - SOLD
posts.post_content:
A very nice example that is centered better than normal. The reason for its relative low grade is due to to the erasure of a pencil mark on the front near the left border. A light impression remains, but there are no surface abrasions or damage.

$SOLD delivered within the US.
